price: Allah meluaskan rezeki dan menyempitkannya bagi siapa yang Dia kehendaki.  Mereka bergembira dengan kehidupan di dunia, padahal kehidupan dunia itu (dibanding dengan) kehidupan akhirat hanyalah kesenangan (yang sedikit).
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُۚ وَفَرِحُواْ بِٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَمَا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِلَّا مَتَٰعٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu wayaqdiru wafariḥū bil-ḥayati al-dun'yā wamā al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā fī al-ākhirati illā matāʿun
